get.summary: Finds table tableIds based on a search query
get.description: Lists all tables with Id and title, but without statistics. Use table titles to rank relevancy against the user's query, and serve only the most relevant tables. Always respond in the same language the user prompts with.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Specifies the language for requests and responses. Use 'no' for Norwegian/Norsk, and 'en' for English or any other language. Ensure all request parameters and data align with this language code. Adheres to ISO 639-1 codes.

English Language Example:.description: Use 'en' for English queries. All request parameters and data will be processed in English.

Norwegian Language Example.description: Select 'no' for Norwegian queries. Requests and responses are handled in Norwegian.

Non-Norwegian and Non-English Language E.description: For languages other than Norwegian or English, use 'en'. All requests will be processed in English, matching the user's input language.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Use parentheses for each search phrase. First start with one phrase '(houshold prices)'. If no results, combine phrases with 'OR' for inclusive searches, like '(household prices) OR (price index)'. Avoid 'AND' as it may restrict results. This syntax helps accurately find statistical tables.

Initial search attempt.description: Initial search attempt. The user's prompt was 'Har du data på årslønn i Norge fra 1998? Here 'årslønn' is the main keyword. The user's prompt is in Norwegian/Norsk, so use the language-code (lang: 'no'). 'Norge' and '1998' is too detailed, use in later request. Phrase is therefore '(årslønn)'.

Extend search if no results from previou.description: Previous attempt of '(residential property)' yielded no results. The search must therefore be extended in this next attempt automatically. Since no results from '(residential property)' we broaden the search with 'OR' to include '(property)'. User's prompt was in English, lang: 'en' used.

Minimize search if ResponseTooLargeError.description: Previous attempt of '(population)' returned a 'ResponseTooLargeError' from user's prompt 'Do you have data on population change?'. The search must be minimized in this next attempt automatically. We replace the previous search with '(population growth)' to be more specific and reduce response size.

Ambiguous user query.description: User's prompt was 'What's the current state of the job market?' which is ambiguous. The initial search uses '(employment rate)' as the primary keyword. If this doesn't yield results, the search is broadened with 'OR' to include '(job market)' to cover related aspects. Language code is 'en'.

Specific and Complex Query.description: User's prompt 'Can you show GDP growth for Norway in 2020?' is specific. Start with '(GDP growth 2020)'. If unsuccessful, expand with 'OR' to '(economic growth 2020)' to find related data. Avoid adding 'Norway' initially to prevent over-narrowing the search.

Non-Standard Terminology.description: For a prompt like 'Har du informasjon om omsorgstjenester for eldre?', start with '(omsorg for eldre)'. If no results are found, use 'OR' to include '(tjenester for senioromsorg)', catering to alternative terminology. Language is 'no'.

Highly Specialized Topic.description: In response to 'Hva er statusen for bruk av fornybar energi i Norge?', begin with '(bruk av fornybar energi)'. If needed, expand with 'OR' to '(bærekraftig energiforbruk)' to cover broader but related topics. Use 'no' for language.

Contemporary Issue.description: For a prompt like 'Hvordan har COVID-19 påvirket økonomien?', the search starts with '(COVID-19-påvirkning)'. If no results are found, it's extended with 'OR' to '(økonomiske effekter av pandemien)' to encompass related economic aspects. Language is 'no'.

get.summary: Get valid variables and values for 'GetTableDataByPost', from a tabel with id: {id}.
get.description: Lists all valid variables and values available in a table. All variables returned in this API response (variables and their valid values) must be included in the subsequent request 'GetTableDataByPost'. Variables can be different from table to table. 'Tid' is always included.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Specifies the language for requests and responses. Use 'no' for Norwegian/Norsk, and 'en' for English or any other language. Ensure all request parameters and data align with this language code. Adheres to ISO 639-1 codes.

English Language Example:.description: Use 'en' for English queries. All request parameters and data will be processed in English.

Norwegian Language Example.description: Select 'no' for Norwegian queries. Requests and responses are handled in Norwegian.

Non-Norwegian and Non-English Language E.description: For languages other than Norwegian or English, use 'en'. All requests will be processed in English, matching the user's input language.

X2.description: ID as a pure string value

items.description: This object represents a variable in the table. The 'code' is used to access the variable in operation 'GetTableDataByPost'. The 'values' is used to access the variable value keys in operation 'GetTableDataByPost'.

code.description: Code to access variable available in table. If the code is 'Tid', make sure to interpret the user's intent and translate it to the correct time period specified in the values array of 'Tid'.

text.description: Variable code as text to display to user

items.description: Variable value keys used to access the variable value in a table. ONLY use these values to access the variable value in operation 'GetTableDataByPost'. If the variable code is 'Tid', make sure to interpret the user's intent and adjust to the correct time period specified in this array.
Variable value code as text to display to user

Get available variables and values from.description: Shows the response from operation 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for table_id: '12880'. The 'Tid' variable has values representing years, meaning that only these years are available in the table. If the user asks for values outside this scope, adjust their request to the closest valid time frame.

value.title: 12880: Makroøkonomiske hovedstørrelser. Regnskap og prognoser, etter statistikkvariabel og år

Get available variables and values from.description: Shows the response from operation 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for table_id: '13760'. The 'Tid' variable has values for months of a year, meaning only these months are available in the table. If the user asks for values outside this scope, adjust their request to the closest valid time frame.

value.title: 13760: Arbeidsstyrken, sysselsatte, arbeidsledige  og utførte ukeverk for personer 15-74 år, etter kjønn, alder, type justering, statistikkvariabel og måned
07681: Eksport av laks og regnbueørret, etter varehovedgruppe, statistikkvariabel og år

valueTexts: Oppdrettet fisk hel, fersk og fryst

post.description: Fetches data from specific table. Response from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for respective table_id must have been called beforehand to create a valid request with valid variables and values. Request body's query array must include all variables with at least one valid value.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Specifies the language for requests and responses. Use 'no' for Norwegian/Norsk, and 'en' for English or any other language. Ensure all request parameters and data align with this language code. Adheres to ISO 639-1 codes.

English Language Example:.description: Use 'en' for English queries. All request parameters and data will be processed in English.

Norwegian Language Example.description: Select 'no' for Norwegian queries. Requests and responses are handled in Norwegian.

Non-Norwegian and Non-English Language E.description: For languages other than Norwegian or English, use 'en'. All requests will be processed in English, matching the user's input language.

X2.description: ID as a pure string value

requestBody.description: Request body for selecting specific data from a table. Each selection object corresponds to a variable in the table, specifying filter criteria. Variables and values must have been fetched from beforehand from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' and must be used to match the users request

query.description: An array of holding selection criteria for each variable.

code.description: The code of the variable to be queried (e.g., 'Kjonn', 'Alder', 'Tid', 'ContentsCode', etc).

selection.description: Details of how to fetch variable values with filter, and which variable values that should be fetched. Valid value keys for the respective variable is listed in the previous operation 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById'.

filter.description: Type of filter applied to the selection. '(item)' is the default maps directly to the value keys listed in the previous operation 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' and provides values for each value key in a list.

values.description: Selected value keys for the variable must match the response from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById'. It cannot be empty and must adhere to the list of value keys in operation 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById'. Always use the 'values' from the response to match the user's request.

items.description: The specific value key within the variable's code list. Must match values from the response from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById'.

format.description: Format of the response. json-stat2 is default.

Get table data from table_id 12880.description: Request body for query on 'Sammenlign Bruttonasjonalprodukt og BNP Fastlands-Norge fra 2020 og ut' Time frame set to '2020-2026' based on latest year '2026' from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for table '12880'.

Get table data from table_id 13760.description: Request body for query on 'Utvikling av ukesverk for begge kjønn, alder 15-74 år, sesongjustert over 3 måneder, de siste 2 årene' Time frame set to '2021M10-2023M10' based on latest month '2023M10' from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for table '13760'.

Get table data from table_id.description: Request body for user's query on 'Jeg ønsker å se utviklingen i eksport av laks og ørret fra 1998 til 2010'. The response from 'GetValidVariablesAndValuesById' for table_id: '07681' is used to create a valid request body. Since the user's query matches with available values, the correct years are used.
